subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. raced to his first Nascar victory since 2007, driving a retro paint scheme honoring his father’s induction into the Nascar Hall of Fame to victory in a Nationwide Series race.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. raced to his first Nascar victory since 2007, driving a retro paint scheme honoring his father’s induction into the Nascar Hall of Fame to victory in a Nationwide Series race.
